ComboBox
public case ComboBox(boolean editable,
                     int maxPopupRows);
Display as a combobox.

Parameters:
editable - whether the contents of the combobox is editable (doesn't works currently)
maxPopupRows - the maximal rows of the popup. If the size of the range succeeds this number, a scrollbar will be used in the popup
